import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' const Navbar = () => { const [navOpen, setOpen] = useState(false) return (

ESHOP

Login
Home Shop
setOpen(!navOpen)}> {navOpen && (
setOpen(!navOpen)}>Login
setOpen(!navOpen)}>Home setOpen(!navOpen)}>Shop
)}
) } export default Navbar
